name: YTs
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat, engaging your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
2. Lift both knees up towards a 90-degree angle, squeezing your abdominal muscles at the top of the movement.
3. Slowly lower your knees down towards the ground, keeping your abs engaged throughout the range of motion.
4. Continue alternating between lifting and lowering your knees in a controlled manner, focusing on contracting your abdominal muscles with each repetition.
short_summary: YTs are an isometric core exercise that primarily targets the rectus abdominis muscle and can be performed using body weight.
